institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 16 (Employment Placement, etc.)
contents: Article 16 (Employment Placement, etc.) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall promote the employment of job seekers through overseas job placement taking into account the country and occupation in which the job seeker wishes to work. ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors may perform the following tasks for effective job placement. there is. 1. Providing overseas employment counseling and information to job seekers, 2. Directly placing job seekers who meet the hiring conditions of the hiring company 3. Holding domestic and foreign overseas employment support events and supporting recruitment events at overseas employment related organizations 4. Job seekers Operation of employment competency enhancement programs and support for recruitment by recruiting companies, 5. Support for concluding employment contracts and provision of services related to departure support to encourage rapid departure and stable local adaptation of prospective employees, 6. Other projects necessary to promote overseas employment for young people, ③ Chairman of the Board may support lodging and event expenses when related organizations, private organizations, etc. participate in various events under paragraph 2., ④ The chairman may appoint and utilize external experts to provide professional counseling services and operate quality programs. there is. In this case, the external expert's allowance and travel expenses can be paid within the budget.
